# portkey_workspace (Resource)

Manages a Portkey workspace. Workspaces are sub-organizational units that enable granular project and team management.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the workspace.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the workspace.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the workspace was created.
- `id` (String) Workspace identifier.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the workspace was last updated.
